titles.title: Praise Him, sing your praise to Him

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise Him, sing your praise to Him
Tell the world of all He's done
The Lord is lifted high
In majesty and splendour He
Is seated on the throne
The Lord is lifted high

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Be lifted up, be lifted up
Be lifted up on our praises
The Lord is lifted high
We lift You up, We lift You up
We lift You up on our praises
The Lord is lifted high
